headline: Ask HN: Recommend a Biography
description:
I saw a recommendation in another thread [0] for a biography of von Neumann [1].

What are some other well-written biographies of interesting people? Bonus points for books that provide some insight into important moments or changes in history.

[0] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30404053 [1] https://www.goodreads.com/en/book/show/56155133-the-man-from-the-future
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 推荐一个传记
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 推薦一個傳記
description_zh-Hans:
我在另一个主题[0]中看到有人推荐冯-诺伊曼的传记[1]。

还有哪些写得不错的有趣人物的传记？如果能对历史上的重要时刻或变化提供一些见解的书，则可加分。

[0] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30404053 [1] https://www.goodreads.com/en/book/show/56155133-the-man-from-the-future
description_zh-Hant:
我在另一個主題[0]中看到有人推薦馮-諾伊曼的傳記[1]。

還有哪些寫得不錯的有趣人物的傳記？如果能對歷史上的重要時刻或變化提供一些見解的書，則可加分。

[0] https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=30404053 [1] https://www.goodreads.com/en/book/show/56155133-the-man-from-the-future
